clues.text: Businesses & professors are among those who give the court information to help one party in an amicus curiae brief, Latin for this

"is believing"

rounds.comments: (LeVar: For example, in "yuletide", you'll find this heavenly body. What is a star from the letters in "Christmas"?)

rounds.text: The name of this pungent gaseous compound is ultimately derived from the top god of the ancient Egyptians
